description: Stay Safe During the HolidaysWith new variants of COVID-19 spiking worldwide, minimizing infection risks over the holiday season is more important than ever. For this upcoming holiday season, make sure to adapt and adjust when

config: gathering and socializing. The following pieces of advice may help you and your family stay safe: wear a mask at all times, keep your distance, organize smaller gatherings, plan ahead to avoid crowds, and, if possible, shop online.
